metadata.description: Jamie Delano (Hellblazer), Frank Quitely (All-Star Superman, X-Men, Doom Patrol), Steve Pugh (Harley Quinn, GrimJack), James Romberger (Seven Miles A Second), and Warren Pleece (Incognegro) deliver a tour de force future, following the lives of a disjointed family, struggling to survive in the morally and socially decadent United States in the far-flung future of... 2020. Time's up.
metadata.name: 2020 Visions
